DOC.brief_summary: To assess safety SB-656933 follow repeat dose 14 day .
DOC.brief_title: A Study To Evaluate The Safety And Tolerability Of SB-656933-AAA Following Repeated Doses In Healthy Adult Subjects .
DOC.detailed_description: A randomised , double-blind , placebo control , dose ascending , parallel group study evaluate safety , tolerability , steady state pharmacokinetics pharmacodynamics SB-656933-AAA follow repeat dos healthy adult subject . The pharmacokinetic interaction repeat dose SB-656933-AAA single dose simvastatin also assess .
DOC.criteria: Healthy adult female , age 1865 year . Female must able child . Nonsmoking last 6 month . Any serious medical condition . Hepatitis B C and/or HIV positive . Currently HRT , medication except paracetamol . Body Mass Index > 30 .
